description.value:
This pelt has a subtle magic. To the two-pelts, it is clear what it does and how to use it. For others, wearing it causes them to be struck with a lycanthropic curse. When first worn and every day on their daily preparations if they continue to wear it, they must make a @Check[will] save against the standard DC of the item's level.

Success They are unaffected, for now.

Failure They exhibit behaviors like that of the animal of the pelt, to the annoyance and concern of those around them, giving a -1 status penalty to attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} and causing failures to become critical failures. They also can't use any of the pelts' abilities. This all remains true until the pelt is removed or the next daily preparations are performed.

@UUID[Compendium.world.ponyfinder-bestiary-effects.Item.O1EePg1WGl5bgKq0]{Effect: Second Pelt}

Critical Failure They pelt's animal nature overwhelms them and they become the animal for the remainder of the day. A two-pelted can remove the cloak from them, or a remove curse can cause it to fall loose. While they are the animal, the cloak is a part of them.
The nature of this object is unclear.
